activities:
Provade may collect and use the following types of personal information:
•	Information about your use of this website
o	Logs of access to the system
o	Logs of performance you experienced using the application
•	Basic information you provide to register with the application including:
o	Name
o	Email
•	Information about transactions carried out over this website, including:
o	Timesheet information
o	Pay Rates
o	Payroll Amounts
o	Progress reports
•	Information that you provide for the purpose of subscribing to the website services including:
o	Resumes
•	Information you provide in communicating with us may be retained to process your inquiries and respond to your requests.
Provade May Use your Personal Information to:
•	Administer the VMS Website
•	Personalize the website for you
•	Enable your access to the website
•	Enable the use of the website service
•	Make information about you available on the website to facilitate obtaining and using services from the website.
•	Supply services to you
•	Auditing and research to maintain and protect our services

personaldata: Includes manually processed data. Provade may collect and use the following types of personal information: Name, email, Resume information, pay rate, bill rate, client location information, timesheet information. Please see Provade's Privacy Policy for all relevant personal data items.
